aboutMe.title: ABOUT ME
paragraphs: Computational biologist, experienced with building image analysis and ML pipelines for bench biologists.
A strong team player with a passion for learning, teaching, and effective communication in interdisciplinary, multicultural, and high-stakes environments.
My previous work involves developing novel imaging techniques and computational tools to understand the intricate dynamics of cellular processes at the molecular level.

My interests are at the intersection of Artificial Intelligence, healthcare innovation, and basic biological discovery. I am always excited to tackle new challenges and collaborate on innovative projects.

papers.authors: Shinyoung Kang, Michael Holcomb, Ameer Hamza Shakur, David Hein, Huong-Tra Ngo, Hunter Schuler, Philip Jarrett, Thomas Dalton, Andrew R Jamieson

Integrins and tetraspanins mediate CD36-actin coupling and regulate CD36 organization and signaling

papers.title: Multiscale imaging and quantitative analysis of plasma membrane protein-cortical actin interplay

miscellaneous: I am an avid photographer and enjoy capturing landscapes and cityscapes.
In my free time, I contribute to open-source scientific software projects.
I also enjoy mentoring students and participating in science outreach programs.
